live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
39771.summary: Some customers in the Abbeydale area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
39771.title: July 20 – Calgary (Abbeydale) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
